publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2810 Mr Mike Rumbles: Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament: Confidentiality-That the Parliament agrees to amend the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament by replacing Section 9.4 with Section 9.4 as set out in Annex D of the Standards Committee's 8th Report 2001, Report on the Investigation of Unauthorised Disclosures.

S1M-2810 Mr Mike Rumbles: Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament: Confidentiality-That the Parliament agrees to amend the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament by replacing Section 9.4 with Section 9.4 as set out in Annex D of the Standards Committee's 8th Report 2001, Report on the Investigation of Unauthorised Disclosures.
S1M-2810 Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament: Confidentiality (lodged on 28 February 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
